name: Opensource Digital Dinosaur Project
short_description: ODDSaur is a project that aims to create a living, breathing dinosaur that exhibits different behaviour on a PC. ODDSaur is based on OpenGL and demonstrates realtime perpixel bump-mapping as well as software vertex-blending.
